SHIPPINGPAR1: Delivery is always hassle-free with MITCHA with the following options:
SHIPPINGPAR2: Deliver to any address in Egypt
SHIPPINGPAR3: For deliveries within Egypt, simply select your city from the destinations drop down menu at the Checkout page to display the available delivery options and charges for your destination.We offer guaranteed delivery within 2-3 business days for Cairo and Alexandria and up to 4 business days for all other locations.Delivery time is calculated from the moment an order is accepted. We work closely with our shipping partner to m inimize any delays on our customers.
SHIPPINGPAR5: now ship to the following countries: United Arab Emirates, KSA, Lebanon, Qatar, United States of America, Kuwait, Bahrain, Jordan, Oman
SHIPPINGPAR6: Please note that international shipment may be custom to extra charges.
SHIPPINGPAR10: Once your order has left our facility, you will receive an e-mail confirmation with your order details. You may also log-in to your E-store account and follow your delivery by selecting My Account, followed by Order Status.
SHIPPINGPAR11: Delivery time is calculated from the moment an order is accepted.
SHIPPINGPAR12: We work closely with our shipping partner to minimize the potential impact of custom delays on our customers.
SHIPPINGPAR13: This option is available for purchases made by electronic payment only and does not apply to purchases made by cash on delivery
